ASSERTION.description: The U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) granted approval for dasatinib for newly diagnosed patients with Philidelphia chromosome-positive (Ph+) CML in chronic phase. It is also approved for adults with chronic, accelerated, myeloid, or lymphoid blast phase Ph+ CML with resistance or intolerance to prior therapy, including imatinib.

SOURCE.citation: Bristol-Myers Squibb Company. Sprycel (dasatinib) [package insert]. U.S. Food and Drug Administration website. https://www.accessdata.fda.gov/drugsatfda_docs/label/2018/021986s021lbl.pdf. Revised December 2018. Accessed November 12, 2020.
